rigidBody.description: A set of parameter values that enable this node and its children to be moved by physics simuation.

collider.description: A set of parameter values that are used to describe how this node detects and responds to collision with other objects in the scene.

trigger.description: A set of parameter values that are used to describe how this node detects collision with other objects in the scene, but does not apply impulses to simulated objects.

joint.description: A set of parameter values that are used to constrain how this node moves relative to another during physics simulation.
